PHRASE.LANG: 侍のカツラ（浪人・男性）
A men's hairstyle during the Edo period. The front hair is left long while the hair on the back is tied up into a ponytail.[#Legal]
江戸時代の男性の髪型のひとつ。前髪を残し、後ろ髪をポニーテールのように結わえた髪型のカツラ。[#Legal]
에도시대의 남성의 머리 모양 중 하나. 앞머리를 남기고 뒷머리를 묶어 올렸다.[#Legal]
A men's hairstyle during the Edo period. The front hair is left long while the hair on the back is tied up into a ponytail.[#Legal]
江戶時代的男性髮型之一。前髮留長，再將後面的頭髮束成馬尾的髮型。[#Legal]
江戶時代的男性髮型之一。前髮留長，再將後面的頭髮束成馬尾的髮型。[#Legal]
A men's hairstyle during the Edo period. The front hair is left long while the hair on the back is tied up into a ponytail.[#Legal]
